running_plans.name: Newborn
running_plans.description: Start your journey with the basics. Build up your strength and endurance gradually.

running_plans.name: Cub
running_plans.description: Progress to more challenging runs as you grow stronger. Explore your surroundings and improve your speed.

running_plans.name: Adolescent Tiger
running_plans.description: Prepare yourself for the hunt. Train harder and push your limits to become a skilled runner.

running_plans.name: Adult Tiger
running_plans.description: Become the apex predator. Master your running skills and conquer any challenge that comes your way.
